channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical -- remote-login-service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical -- remote-login-service

item.title: CVE-2013-1053|2024-08-06T14:49:20.562Z -- canonical -- remote-login-service
item.description: In crypt.c of remote-login-service, the cryptographic algorithm used to cache usernames and passwords is insecure. An attacker could use this vulnerability to recover usernames and passwords from the file. This issue affects version 1.0.0-0ubuntu3 and prior versions.
